ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Today's Patch Message
ygData.msgSnippet: Several my Guildies went to the one in Las Vegas and had a blast.  The biggest fun was simply meeting people face to face and party with them... I m going to
ygData.messageBody:
Several my Guildies went to the one in Las Vegas and had a blast. The
biggest fun was simply meeting people face to face and party with them...

I'm going to Baltimore. And remember - this is strictly a BUSINESS TRIP!
(One of the few perks of being self-employed)

Slyde
-----Original Message-----
From: Matt DeBarger [mailto:mattdeba@...]
Sent: Wednesday, January 17, 2001 8:45 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Today's Patch Message

Hey, has anyone ever attended one of these Fan faires? For the first time
there is one near my house (I live in Philadelphia) Whats it like?


Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
